markdownRemark.excerpt: This selector targets all of the siblings of a particular element. For example, if you wanted to target paragraphs in the same hierarchy as your level-â€¦
markdownRemark.html:
This selector targets all of the siblings of a particular element. For example, if you wanted to target paragraphs in the same hierarchy as your level-1 headings, you would do:

h1~p { color: red; }

Also, tips for CSSBattle https://www.sitepoint.com/code-challenge-2-4-tips-for-higher-scores-in-cssbattle-dev/

frontmatter.title: TIL#8
frontmatter.description: My everyday TIL: The general sibling selector
